content: Each assert statement is ended by a semi-colon (;). However, assertions are disabled by default, so you must run the program with the -ea argument in order for assertions to be enabled (java -ea [name of compiled program]).
stemmed: each assert statement end semi-colon ( ; ) . howev , assert disabl default , must run program -ea argument order assert enabl ( java -ea [ name compil program ] ) .
